value.description: Gemstone blades attached to shaft, capable of cutting through armored enemies with ease.\n\nUsable with shields.
Lovingly carved to perfection, this bow and its arrows are imbued with crystalline energies and can allow the user to take down enemies from a great distance.
Exotic dagger with a razor-sharp edge, enhanced by remnant effects from Project Baetyl geo-engineering to increase its lethality.\n\nUsable with shields.
Regal looking polearm with large gemstone blades, capable of stopping all but the largest adversaries.
A razor sharp blade with a deadly purpose, a choice weapon for those who strive for a balance between elegance and power.\n\nUsable with shields.

An alluring glow gives away the fact that this is an enhanced ring. This ring allow its wearer to release destructive bolts of energy around their target.

Shields cannot be used along with this weapon as they interfere with the flow of energies around the user.

Does not drop on down or death.
Regal looking polearm with a gemstone tip, capable of puncturing through armored enemies.\n\nUsable with shields.

Beautiful as it is deadly, this staff is charged with crystalline energy and can be used to launch a barrage upon enemies.\n\nShields cannot be used along with this weapon as they interfere with the flow of energies around the user.

Beautiful as it is deadly, this wand is charged with crystalline energy and is a choice weapon for its remarkable effectiveness and ease of use.\n\nShields cannot be used along with this weapon as they interfere with the flow of energies around the user.
Hunk of gemstone attached to a pole, capable pulverising armored enemies.\n\nUsable with shields.
